Name: Fortifications on the Caribbean Side of Panama: Portobelo-San Lorenzo
Description: Fortifications on the Caribbean Side of Panama: Portobelo-San Lorenzo - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Examples of Spanish military architecture from the 17th and 18th centuries.

Name: Darién National Park
Description: Darién National Park - UNESCO World Heritage Site. A park with a wide range of habitats, including tropical forests and coastlines, with exceptional biodiversity.

Name: Archaeological Site of Panamá Viejo and Historic District of Panamá
Description: Archaeological Site of Panamá Viejo and Historic District of Panamá - UNESCO World Heritage Site. The original European settlement on the Pacific coast of the Americas and its 17th-century replacement.

Name: Coiba National Park and its Special Zone of Marine Protection
Description: Coiba National Park and its Special Zone of Marine Protection - UNESCO World Heritage Site. A park protecting islands and marine areas with a large number of endemic species.
